titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of National Middle Level Education Month.
Supporting the goals and ideals of National Middle Level Education Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of National Middle Level Education Month.
Recognizes the importance of middle level education and the contributions of the those who educate this unique age group.
Encourages people to observe National Middle Level Education Month by visiting and celebrating schools that are responsible for educating the nation's young adolescents.
